name: a day in the life of a sea witch
name_original: a day in the life of a sea witch
description:
PLEASE GIVE IT A MOMENT TO LOAD!!

there is a lack of bitsy mermaid games... so of course i had to make a game about a cecaelia that featured mermaids  ¯\_(´･ω･`)_/¯  

a special thanks to:

  • image-to-bitsy by ruin
  • bitsy hacks by sean and mildmojo
  • bitsymuse by verticalblanking

disclaimer: this was a game i started a month or two ago and finished it for the jam because it fit the theme
